transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often travel on rails. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I go 'choo choo!'
💺 Many people can ride at the same time
🛤️ I follow a special track

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a raft!
⚓ I need an anchor to stop.
🚢 I'm used to travel across a lake or an ocean

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use pedals to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me to school.
🚦 You should wear a helmet when you ride me.
🚲 I have pedals that you use to make me go.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm bigger than a bird!
💺 I have lots of seats.
✈️ I have wings and engines to fly.

transport.question: I help put out fires quickly. I have a ladder and a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 My color is usually red.
🚨 I make a loud noise to warn people.
💦 I carry water to help stop flames.

transport.question: I take many children to school in the morning. I am long and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing red lights.
👧 I pick up children on my route.
🚌 I am a large vehicle with many seats.

transport.question: I travel underground carrying many passengers, stopping at stations along the way. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I'm a type of train.
🗺️ You can avoid traffic with me!
📍 I have a map to show you where I go.

transport.question: I have two rotors on top and can hover in the air. I can also land in small places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I sound like 'whop whop whop'!
🚑 I can be used to rescue people.
🏞️ I don't need a runway to take off or land.

transport.question: I'm a large vehicle that carries goods over long distances on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry boxes.
🛣️ I travel on highways.
🚚 I have many wheels and a big trailer.

transport.question: I travel to space and explore planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I have a pointy nose!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I leave the Earth's atmosphere.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I help plants make seeds.
🍯 I make something sweet and yellow.
🐝 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I hop around and I'm green. I make a chirping sound! What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat plants.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
🎶 My song is called a chirp.

bug.question: I have many legs and I march in a line, carrying food back home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏘️ I live in a colony.
🐜 I am often found on picnics.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then go into a chrysalis, and emerge with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I love to sip nectar from flowers.
🎨 My wings are often brightly colored.
🐛 I undergo metamorphosis.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I use bioluminescence.
💡 I can be found in gardens and forests.
🔥 Some people call me a lightning bug.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and can sometimes be found in gardens. I am red with black spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am considered lucky in many cultures.
🌱 I eat aphids that damage plants.
⚫ My spots can vary in number.

bug.question: I like to hide under rocks and have a lot of legs. When scared, I curl up in a ball. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am not an insect, but a crustacean!
🌍 I help decompose organic matter in the soil.
⚽ I roll up to protect myself.

bug.question: I buzz around in the summer, and drink blood. People often try to swat me away. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 Only the females bite.
🦟 I lay my eggs in water.
😖 My bite can be itchy.

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My web is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
Fly is one of my favorite meals.

bug.question: I can walk on water and am often found near ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I use surface tension to my advantage.
⛸️ I have long legs that help me glide.
🐜 I eat smaller bugs that fall into the water.
